title: Delete Duplicate Emails
markdown:
# **Delete Duplicate Emails**

## Write a SQL query to delete all duplicate email entries, keeping only the one with the smallest Id.

### Table Schema
| Column | Type |
|--------|------|
| id     | INT  |
| email  | TEXT |

### Example

**Input:**
```
**Person**
+----+------------------+
| id | email            |
+----+------------------+
| 1  | john@example.com |
| 2  | bob@example.com  |
| 3  | john@example.com |
+----+------------------+
```

**Expected Output:**
```
+----+------------------+
| id | email            |
+----+------------------+
| 2  | bob@example.com  |
| 1  | john@example.com |
+----+------------------+
```

testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE Person(id INT, email TEXT); INSERT INTO Person VALUES (1,'john@example.com'),(2,'bob@example.com'),(3,'john@example.com');
testCases.solutionSql: SELECT MIN(id) as id, email FROM Person GROUP BY email;

testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE Person(id INT, email TEXT); INSERT INTO Person VALUES (1,'a@b.com'),(2,'c@d.com');
testCases.solutionSql: SELECT MIN(id) as id, email FROM Person GROUP BY email;

testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE Person(id INT, email TEXT); INSERT INTO Person VALUES (1,'a@b.com'),(2,'a@b.com'),(3,'a@b.com');
testCases.solutionSql: SELECT MIN(id) as id, email FROM Person GROUP BY email;
